Name: Maiden's Blush
Ingredients: 2.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Pale pink (depending on your grenadine), gin-laced rich fruit and subtle lemon sourness.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Harry Craddock 's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book .
Nutrition: One serving of Maiden's Blush contains 189 calories
